Package com.dua3.utility.text

Class RichTextMatcher

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.RichTextMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchResult
public class RichTextMatcher extends Object implements MatchResult
A RichText version of the Matcher class.

    • rgroup

      public RichText rgroup()
      Returns the input subsequence matched by the previous match, see Matcher.group().
      Returns:
      the (possibly empty) subsequence matched by the previous match, in RichText form
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no match has yet been attempted, or if the previous match operation failed

    • group

      public String group(int group)
      Specified by:
      group in interface MatchResult

    • rgroup

      public RichText rgroup(int group)
      Returns the input subsequence captured by the given group during the previous match operation, see Matcher.group(int).
      Parameters:
      group - the index of a capturing group in this matcher's pattern
      Returns:
      the (possibly empty) subsequence captured by the group during the previous match, or null if the group failed to match part of the input
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no match has yet been attempted, or if the previous match operation failed
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is no capturing group in the pattern with the given index

    • groupCount

      public int groupCount()
      Specified by:
      groupCount in interface MatchResult

    • find

      public boolean find()
      Attempts to find the next occurrence of the pattern within the input sequence.
      Returns:
      true if the pattern is found within the input sequence, false otherwise See Matcher.find().

    • find

      public boolean find(int start)
      Attempts to find the next occurrence of the pattern within the input sequence, starting at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      start - the position in the input sequence to start searching for the pattern
      Returns:
      true if the pattern is found starting from the specified position, false otherwise See Matcher.find(int).

    • replaceFirst

      public RichText replaceFirst(CharSequence replacement)
      Replaces the first occurrence of the pattern in the input sequence with the specified replacement.
      Parameters:
      replacement - the sequence to be substituted for the first match
      Returns:
      a new RichText instance with the first occurrence of the pattern replaced See Matcher.replaceFirst(String).

    • replaceAll

      public RichText replaceAll(CharSequence replacement)
      Replaces all occurrences of the pattern in the input sequence with the specified replacement.
      Parameters:
      replacement - the sequence to be substituted for each match
      Returns:
      a new RichText instance with all occurrences of the pattern replaced See Matcher.replaceAll(String).
